page.title: 07INSTITUTE OF OCEANOGRAPHY
page.content:
{ The Institute of Oceanography }was established in 1973 when three separate bodies combined to form a new government-funded institute at Wormley.It has eight departments which study Marine Physics,(waves and currents),Chemistry (contents of water) Geology (sub-strata) ,Biology (creatures in the sea) Electronics (design of experiments),Engineering, Administration and Information. There are 217 staff,178 men and 39 women,who are employed in many different jobs.The working day starts at 9am and ends at 5.30pm,with two coffee breaks that are about 15 minutes long in the morning and afternoon.
The workers wear casual clothes and
